name: places/ChIJ034Z8a5ZwokRWFISdj0crWk
formattedAddress: 178 5th Ave Suite 2R, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 178 5th Ave Suite 2R, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text:
Anyone looking to rent an apartment in NYC would be lucky to work with Robert.

Before working with Robert, I had realized that I wouldn’t be able to win the real estate game in New York by myself. I got referred to Robert and within less then 48h we had scheduled a virtual call for discovery (mentioning that he scheduled that although having COVID).

He was extremely knowledgeable, honest, bright and is an expert of the New York housing market. With his amazing warm, friendly personality we met a few weeks later to ‘just get started’ and investigate a first apartment, which met my listed criteria. With no expectations, I can only highlight that it literally took one sight to make a final decision and sign. I had looked into 19 open houses, but the apartment I have signed with Robert was unbeatable.

Moving from Boston to New York didn’t make it easy to get everything settled in place especially not, when you are trying to get into a Co-op apartment, while being on Business Trips in Europe. But Robert made it happen and diligently resolved outstanding task with the landlord and building management. I was very impressed with Robert’s professionalism, and work ethic. His personal skills and integrity are impeccable. Always responsive and helpful until the last minute and beyond your move-in date.

I definitely work with Robert again in any case I have any future real estate needs and highly recommend him to anyone who is searching for a diligent and trustworthy broker. Thanks again Robert for being such a pleasure to work with.

originalText.text: Robert is an excellent realtor who gave me 100% of his energy and attention when I was looking for my new home. Once I made an offer on my apartment he negotiated on my behalf, answered all my questions, and seamlessly prepared and submitted the board package. From my initial interest in buying New York City real estate all the way through the closing Robert was responsive and available. He made what would be a confusing and stressful experience into an informed and pleasant one. I am writing this review from my new dream apartment--all thanks to Robert!

text.text: Robert is an excellent realtor who gave me 100% of his energy and attention when I was looking for my new home. Once I made an offer on my apartment he negotiated on my behalf, answered all my questions, and seamlessly prepared and submitted the board package. From my initial interest in buying New York City real estate all the way through the closing Robert was responsive and available. He made what would be a confusing and stressful experience into an informed and pleasant one. I am writing this review from my new dream apartment--all thanks to Robert!

originalText.text: Robert was wonderful to work with and made the entire process of renting an apartment in NYC seamless. He consistently went the extra mile for me by ensuring in-person that each step of the process between me and the leasing office went smoothly. With Robert's expertise and dedication, I was able to secure an excellent apartment that suited my needs within just two weeks without having to travel to NYC until the deal was near closing. I would wholeheartedly recommend Robert's services.

I would wholeheartedly recommend Robert's services.

originalText.text: Robert was the best and most professional real estate salesperson I met when looking to lease my first NYC apartment. Not only is he super professional and responsive, but he got to know me and what was important to me in a rental. He recommended and showed me the perfect unit in a great location and was very helpful throughout the process. He lifted so much stress off me and can’t thank him enough!

text.text: Robert was the best and most professional real estate salesperson I met when looking to lease my first NYC apartment. Not only is he super professional and responsive, but he got to know me and what was important to me in a rental. He recommended and showed me the perfect unit in a great location and was very helpful throughout the process. He lifted so much stress off me and can’t thank him enough!

originalText.text: I was recommended Robert through a mutual friend as my boyfriend and I were looking for a short term furnished unit in NYC for a work trip. This was no easy feat to find on our own two weeks out moving from Texas. Robert came back with options within a day, a was very friendly and responsive throughout the process. He also goes to the property and gave us a  virtual tour. He continues to be helpful and advocate on our behalf with any questions/issues even after we signed the lease!! Really goes above and beyond, highly recommend.
